snippet: OLNICK--Sylvia. The partners and staff of Berdon LLP mourn the passing of our client and good friend Sylvia Olnick, under whose guidance the Olnick Organization continued its tradition as one of the most respected and successful development, management and leasing companies in New York. Our fondest thoughts go out to her children, Barbara and Nancy, her grandchildren, and great-grandchildren. We will all miss her dearly. 1/3
lead_paragraph: OLNICK--Sylvia. The partners and staff of Berdon LLP mourn the passing of our client and good friend Sylvia Olnick, under whose guidance the Olnick Organization continued its tradition as one of the most respected and successful development, management and leasing companies in New York. Our fondest thoughts go out to her children, Barbara and Nancy, her grandchildren, and great-grandchildren. We will all miss her dearly. 1/3
